name: STACKBLAST
description:
The goal is simple, catch all the blocks before they fall out of reach, and hold them steady; but stack carefully, because some blocks are unstable.  If certain blocks touch, they'll explode, and can send your stack toppling over.

This game was made by my friends and I for LM0B Beginner's Game Jam #8, with the theme Unstable. 

Third Part Assets:

INVASION2000 Font Pack as seen here created by PizzaDude.
